name: Oily Coily
description:
Oily Coily is from the planet melanin and was sent on a mission to stop the evildoers from destroying the hair ingredients. Oily Coily needs your help to dodge your fears and collect as many items as possible. This game app will also make you feel confident, proud and empowered to have natural hair.

Support us for more innovative games.

Hit the follow button on:
Instagram: @itsoilycoily
@oilycoily
TikTok: @oilycoily
Visit: www.oilycoily.com
